text: Dance Remixes is the first remix album by American rapper Lil' Kim. It was released on June 6, 2006 by Atlantic Records. The album has dance remixes of the two singles "Lighters Up" and "Whoa" from Kim's fourth studio album The Naked Truth (2005). It also has two remixes of "Big Momma Thang" and a remix of "Queen Bitch" from Kim's debut album Hard Core (1996). == Track listing == The official track listing for the album. == References == Category:2006 albums Category:Dance albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Lil' Kim albums
title: Dance Remixes
